trans-unit.source: Locations for Calendar Base event records.
The Location record facilitates the easy addition of repetitious locations, addresses, and even maps for your events.
Use this to temporarily exclude this location from display.
The name of this location such as Office or Church.
A description of the location.
The street address.
The ZIP code or postal code of the location.
The location's city.
The country of the location.
The state of the location. The drop-down menu will not be available until you have included the country information and saved the form.
The location's contact phone number.
The location's contact email address.
A picture of the location or its logo.
An alternative website for the location.
Alternate text shown if images are not found or not supported.
If you have multiple images, alt text entries must be listed on separate lines.
Tooltip or hover text.
If you have multiple images, title text entries must be listed on separate lines.
Adds a caption beneath each image.
If you have multiple images, captions must be listed on separate lines.
